title: YayText
description: YayText is a web-based tool that converts normal text into styled text using Unicode. There are over 100 different styles available on YayText, including: bold, italics, strikethrough, cursive, upside-down text, bubble text, and tiny text. You can copy & paste the text that YayText generates in social media posts, DMs, etc. It even works on this very description field right here on Product Hunt... like 𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐬, 𝑡ℎ𝑖𝑠, t̶h̶i̶s̶, 𝓉𝒽𝒾𝓈, sıɥʇ, ⓣⓗⓘⓢ, ₜₕᵢₛ, ƫɦᶖś, ꖡꖾꕯꕷ, and 𖢧𖦙𖥣𖨚.
